data.title: U.S. Elections
data.statement: In this problem, you are given information about an election based on the U.S. Electoral system. Each state has a certain number of electors, and the winner in each state (either the Republican or Democrat party) receives all of that state's electoral votes. Your task is to determine the overall winner of the election.

testCases.title: Democrats
testCases.testIn:
3
NY 10 D
AL 11 R
CA 40 D

testCases.title: Democrats
testCases.testIn:
3
NY 10 D
AL 20 R
CA 40 D

data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read state:word(20) electors:int winner:word(20)
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[N]] for the number of states.
<<Next [[N]] lines:>> Each line contains:
A string [[state]], the name of the state.
An integer [[electors]], the number of electoral votes for that state.
A character [[winner]], which is either {{D}} (for Democrats) or {{R}} (for Republicans), indicating which party won that state.
data.outputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> Print {{Democrats}} if the Democrats win the election (i.e., have more total electoral votes).
Print {{Republicans}} if the Republicans win the election.
Print {{Draw}} if both parties have the same number of electoral votes.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

In this problem, you are given information about an election based on the U.S. Electoral system. Each state has a certain number of electors, and the winner in each state (either the Republican or Democrat party) receives all of that state's electoral votes. Your task is to determine the overall winner of the election.
Input
Line 1: An integer N for the number of states.
Next N lines: Each line contains:
A string state, the name of the state.
An integer electors, the number of electoral votes for that state.
A character winner, which is either D (for Democrats) or R (for Republicans), indicating which party won that state.
Output
Line 1 : Print Democrats if the Democrats win the election (i.e., have more total electoral votes).
Print Republicans if the Republicans win the election.
Print Draw if both parties have the same number of electoral votes.
Constraints
N <= 51
Example
Input
2
NY 10 D
AL 11 R
Output
Republicans
